mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs(num, empId, subject, content, saveFilename, originalFilename, hitCount, regDate, block) VALUES (bbs_seq.NEXTVAL, #{empId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM bbs b JOIN employee2 e2 ON b.empId = e2.empId
AND block = 0

SELECT b.num, b.empId, name, subject, TO_CHAR(b.regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, hitCount, saveFilename, NVL(replyCount, 0) replyCount FROM bbs b JOIN employee2 e2 ON b.empId = e2.empId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) replyCount FROM bbsReply WHERE parentNum = 0 AND showReply = 1 AND block = 0 GROUP BY num ) c ON b.num = c.num
AND block = 0
ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT b.num, b.empId, name, subject, content, hitCount, b.regDate, saveFilename, originalFilename, block, NVL(boardLikeCount, 0) boardLikeCount FROM bbs b JOIN employee2 e2 ON b.empId = e2.empId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) boardLikeCount FROM bbsLike GROUP BY num ) bc ON b.num = bc.num WHERE b.num = #{num} AND block = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE bbs SET hitCount = hitCount + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT num, subject FROM bbs b JOIN employee2 e2 ON b.empId = e2.empId
AND (num > #{num}) AND block = 0
ORDER BY num ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT num, subject FROM bbs b JOIN employee2 e2 ON b.empId = e2.empId
AND (num < #{num}) AND block = 0
ORDER BY num DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bbsLike WHERE num = #{num} AND empId = #{empId}
